sourceDesc.p: YE Shaoyong, Jundo NAGASHIMA, Jiro HIRABAYASHI,Noriyuki KUDO, Gudrun MELZER and Takamichi FUKIA, “The Sanskrit Fragments Or.15009 in the Hoernle Collection" in: Buddhist Manuscripts from Central Asia: The British Library Sanskrit Fragments, Volume II.1 (Texts), ed. by Seishi KARASHIMA and Klaus WILLE, Tokyo: The International Research Institute for Advanced Buddhology at Soka University, 2009, pp. 105-551.
